verbose_text: To deplete CenpT and CenpC, siRNA oligos targeting their mRNA coding sequences were transfected into RPE1 Ndc80-EGFP (MC191) cells and incubated for 48 hr.
evidence: deplete CenpT and CenpC, siRNA oligos targeting their mRNA coding sequences were transfected into RPE1 Ndc80-EGFP (MC191) cells and incubated for 48 hr
